actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Federal contribution for Federal employee health benefits coverage shall be determined on the basis of the average of the two health benefits plans having the highest subscription charges.

summary.text: Provides that the Federal contribution for Federal employee health benefits coverage shall be determined on the basis of the average of the two health benefits plans having the highest subscription charges. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8906)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Federal contribution for Federal employee health benefits coverage shall be determined on the basis of the average of the two health benefits plans having the highest subscription charges.
